`/track <creature>` - Start tracking a baby
`/status` - View all active creatures
`/stats <id>` - Detailed creature info
`/stop <id>` - Stop tracking a creature
`/stopall` - Stop all tracking

`/buffer` - Time until food runs out

`/settings game` - Set ASE or ASA

`/settings notify` - Configure notifications
help.server_desc:
`/server-track` - Manage server status alerts
`/info` - Bot version
